location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Contre Amiral Rivet and Mr C. D. Belgrave'

mods.abstract: A black and white photograph of Charles Belgrave and the French Naval Officer, Contre Amiral Rivet taken when the French Sloop Bougainvillevisited Bahrain on 14-16 February 1935.
